    • basicProduction

      public void basicProduction​(ResourceCount storagePayment, ResourceCount chestPayment, Resource outputResource)
      Basic production on the dashboard Sends a BasicProductionMessage to the server
      Parameters:
      storagePayment - amount of resources from the storage that the user wants to use in order to pay
      chestPayment - amount of resources from the chest that the user wants to use in order to pay
      outputResource - Resource chosen by the user as output

    • leaderProduction

      public void leaderProduction​(int index, LeaderCard card, ResourceCount storageCount, ResourceCount chestCount, Resource res)
      Production in a Leader Card Sends a LeaderProductionMessage to the server
      Parameters:
      card - Leader Card chosen
      storageCount - amount of resources from the storage that the user wants to use in order to pay
      chestCount - amount of resources from the chest that the user wants to use in order to pay
      res - Resource chosen by the user as output

      to - the arriving position

      Parameters:
      from - start of the swap
      to - arrive of the swap

      Returns:

    • moveLeaderResources

      public void moveLeaderResources​(Resource resource, int num, boolean fromLeader)
      Send a MoveFromLeaderToDeposit/MoveFromDepositToLeader - Message depending on the choice done on the cli
      Parameters:
      resource - type of resource to move to find the indexes of the countertop and special ability deposit
      num - number of resources to move
      fromLeader - true if MoveFromLeaderToDeposit, false if MoveFromDepositToLeader

      public void buyCard​(ResourceCount storage, ResourceCount chest, int id, int position)
      Send a CardShopMessage with the chosen parameters
      Parameters:
      storage - resources taken from the storage to pay
      chest - resources taken from the chest to pay
      id - of the chosen card
      position - chosen to place the card on the dashboard

    • getMarketMarbles

      public MarketMarble[] getMarketMarbles​(int type, int pos)
      Parameters:
      type - 0: row selected; 1: column selected
      pos - the number of the selected row or column (starting from 1)
      Returns:
      the marbles in the selected row/column

    • hasWhiteChangeAbility

      public boolean hasWhiteChangeAbility()
      Checks if the current user has played a leader card with WhiteChangeAbility
      Returns:
      true if the user has played a LeaderCard with WhiteChangeAbility false if the user has not played a LeaderCard with WhiteChangeAbility

    • hasAdditionalDeposit

      public boolean hasAdditionalDeposit​(Resource res)
      Parameters:
      res - the resource type of the deposit
      Returns:
      true if the user has an additional deposit of that type

    • getWhiteChangeCard

      public LeaderCard getWhiteChangeCard​(int card)
      Returns the Leader Card with WhiteChangeAbility chosen by the user
      Parameters:
      card - the number of the Leader Card selected by the user (considering only in-game Leader Cards with WhiteChangeAbility, in the order they are saved)
      Returns:
      the chosen LeaderCard

    • getResource

      public void getResource​(int row)
      Sends an AtomicMarketAction that stores a resource
      Parameters:
      row - the number of the storage row in which the resource should be added

    • discardResource

      public void discardResource()
      Sends an AtomicMarketAction that discards a marble

    • convertMarble

      public void convertMarble​(LeaderCard leaderCard, int row)
      Sends an AtomicMarketAction that converts a white marble
      Parameters:
      leaderCard - the used Leader Card
      row - the number of the storage row in which the resource should be added

    • endMarketAction

      public void endMarketAction​(int type, int pos)
      Send a message indicating that the user has completed the MarketAction
      Parameters:
      type - 0: the user has selected a row; 1: the user has selected a column
      pos - the number of the row or column chosen (starting from 1)

    • getShopCardByID

      public DevelopmentCard getShopCardByID​(int ID)
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of the card
      Returns:
      the Development card associated to the passed ID

      Returns:
      this client dashboard
